title: Authorizes reduced cost on hunting; fishing and big game fees for certain disabled persons
summary: Provides that a resident of the state for a period of three months prior to the date of application and who is otherwise qualified for certain hunting, fishing and big game licenses and who has a disability as defined in the executive law shall be entitled to receive such license at 50% of the cost set by statute.
actClause: AN ACT to amend the environmental conservation law, in relation to fees for licenses for disabled persons
